name: Hentai Nazi HITLER is Back
description:
Hentai Nazi HITLER is Back - You thought it was so easy to stop? No no! He is back, only now, he has friends. Who are they? You should find out. You are expected by 3 different villages, with different features, this is all accompanied by humor and Easter eggs.

Trite? Simply? And you, stop Hitler and his friends, and you find all the secrets and try to survive. Meet me at the end, private.
My dear friend, here is what awaits you:
  - You must collect campaign posters.
  - Kill your enemies.
  - Destroy two popular bosses. You will find a lot of Easter eggs, secrets, puzzles. It's time to stop Hitler and his best friend Stalin.

Hitler, conceived something, deal with it!
